participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Light-hearted and adventurous, Alex enjoys making people laugh and embraces new experiences.
participant_1.background: I spent my last vacation on a comedy tour because I love to laugh. I'm working on finding a new job and trying to figure out what I want to do with my life. I got married to my high school friend. I am a hardcore biker. I ve reached 50k subscribers !.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Jake enjoys documenting his experiences and has a keen interest in health and wellness.
participant_2.background: I keep a journal of my memories to help me remember how I used to feel when I was younger. I am a 25 year old male who is concerned about his health and weight. I like to spend time on websites about pens and lobster. My dad and I own over 600 movies. I like to pamper myself.

content.text: I just got back from a comedy tour, it was so much fun!
I love comedy, I watch it all the time!
Me too, I love to laugh.
What's your favorite type of comedy?
I like all kinds of comedy, but I think my favorite is observational comedy.
That's a good kind of comedy.
Yeah, I like it because it's relatable.
Me too. What's your favorite comedy show?
I don't know if I have a favorite, but I really like Key and Peele.
Me too! They're so funny.
Yeah, they're one of the best comedy duos out there.
Do you watch any other comedy shows?
Yeah, I watch a lot of different shows. I like Nathan for You, Broad City, and Arrested Development.
I've never seen Nathan for You, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a really funny show. It's about a guy who goes around trying to help people with their problems, but he always ends up making things worse.
That sounds like a good show, I'll have to check it out.
You should, it's really funny.
Well, I'm glad you had a good time on your comedy tour.
Thanks, I did!
I'm sure it was fun.
It was.
Good.
